entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 16 except 9 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High 16 except 9 along parts of the coast. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of rain. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 10 except 16 inland.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm.
